remarks: Equation 6.48 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ip1i.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ip1i.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
ip1i.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
ip1i.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ip1i.9 $e |- U e. CPreHilOLD $.
ip2i.8 $e |- A e. X $.
ip2i.9 $e |- B e. X $.
ip2i $p |- ( ( 2 S A ) P B ) = ( 2 x. ( A P B ) ) $.
